candidate Profile Description.summary: Business Analytics student minoring in Marketing. Aspiring to work in a dynamic environment to optimize the company's performance utilizing my data analytics and machine learning skills. Extremely passionate about analytics and statistics, I am always striving to gain new knowledge in this field.

education.degree: Bachelor in Science of Business Administration

academic_project_experience.name: Customer Churn Prediction
academic_project_experience.description: Used data preprocessing techniques and implemented an Artificial Neural Network using TensorFlow to understand the reasons behind customer churn, achieving an accuracy of 77%.

academic_project_experience.name: Marketing Campaign Analysis
academic_project_experience.description: Performed an in-depth analysis to assess campaign impact on different groups of customers using Python and Jupyter Notebook. Visualized the pivot tables and identified age groups most responsive to marketing campaigns.

academic_project_experience.name: AirBnB Data Visualization
academic_project_experience.description: Created a Tableau dashboard using Seattle Airbnb data to answer investor questions about profitable zip codes, optimal rental periods, and the impact of bedroom count on rental prices.

academic_project_experience.name: Miel Boumiza International Marketing Strategy
academic_project_experience.description: Developed an international marketing strategy for the Tunisian honey brand 'Miel Boumiza' targeting the French market. Conducted a macro and micro-environment analysis.

academic_project_experience.name: CarE Digital Marketing Strategy
academic_project_experience.description: Built marketing and digital marketing strategies for the brand CarE, a Tunisian platform offering on-demand car and dry-cleaning services. Developed a digital marketing plan to boost brand awareness.
